label: ham
to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: spelling was Re: GRML swspeak?
body: 168 (return) [ Ammianus (xxii. 4) speaks of some court eunuchs who were spoliis templorum pasti. Libanius says (Orat. pro Templ. p. 23) that the emperor often gave away a temple, like a dog, or a horse, or a slave, or a gold cup; but the devout philosopher takes care to observe that these sacrilegious favorites very seldom prospered.]
